notes:
🔐 MyWallpaper Desktop v0.1.2 - OAuth Authentication Fixed!

✨ New Features:
- **OAuth Authentication**: Google and GitHub login now work properly in Tauri app!
- External browser authentication flow for secure OAuth
- Automatic environment detection (Web vs Tauri)

🔧 Technical Updates:
- Added tauri-plugin-opener for secure external browser OAuth
- Smart OAuth hook switching between web and desktop environments
- Enhanced error handling for authentication flows
- Maintained Windows auto-start functionality

🖥️ Desktop users can now authenticate with Google/GitHub through their default browser! 🔐✨
